InformativeText.Summary: The Report Map characteristic is used to define formatting information for Input Report, Output Report, and Feature Report data transferred between a HID Device and HID Host, information on how this data can be used, and other information regarding physical aspects of the device (i.e. that the device functions as a keyboard, for example, or has multiple functions such as a keyboard and volume controls). Only a single instance of this characteristic exists as part of a HID Service.
